org.grouplens.lenskit.basic

Class SimpleRatingPredictor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.AbstractRatingPredictor
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.SimpleRatingPredictor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RatingPredictor

    public final class SimpleRatingPredictor
extends AbstractRatingPredictor
    Basic RatingPredictor backed by an ItemScorer. The scores are clamped to the preference domain but otherwise unmodified.

    If a baseline predictor is provided, then it is used to supply predictions that the item scorer could not.

    This class has a provider SimpleRatingPredictor.Provider that is the default provider for RatingPredictor.

    Since:
    1.1

      • predict

        public void predict(long user,
                    @Nonnull
                    MutableSparseVector scores)
        Description copied from interface: RatingPredictor
        Predict for items in a vector. The key domain of the provided vector is the items whose predictions are requested, and the predict method sets the values for each item to its predict (or unsets it, if no prediction can be provided). The previous values are discarded.
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        scores - The prediction output vector. Its key domain is the items to score.
